instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.SMC_LID: What is SMC_LID? SMC_LID tells the machine the system is open when it is 3.3v to 3.4v, and closed when it is low such as 0v-0.6v. When this signal is low, the machine may go to sleep or have no backlight. .

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No image (no <SIGNAL>LCD_IG_PWR_EN</SIGNAL>) liquid damage, bongs, spins
threads.message:
No display.  Checked with light through the back; display is not blocking light, and no folder icon or other details showing.

Light liquid damage across multiple locations on the board

USB boot stick flashes, several times over the course of a couple of minutes.

No 3V3 to the LCD, 0V for <SIGNAL>LCD_IG_PWR_EN</SIGNAL>  on <CHIP>U9000</CHIP>, and tested at <RESISTOR>R1984</RESISTOR> as well, 80K to GND. <CHIP>U9000</CHIP>:2,3 have 3V3.

<SIGNAL>SMC_LID</SIGNAL> is ~3V3

Do not have a DP cable  to test externally (will purchase tomorrow).

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No image (no <SIGNAL>LCD_IG_PWR_EN</SIGNAL>) liquid damage, bongs, spins
threads.message: Screen needs to be detected first, do you have <SIGNAL>PP3V3_S0_LCD</SIGNAL>? Check L9080 also..

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No image (no <SIGNAL>LCD_IG_PWR_EN</SIGNAL>) liquid damage, bongs, spins
threads.message:
L9008 was high (43K). Replaced and everything came good.

Thanks for the information, made me realise that there was the 2nd 3V3 lines separate from the ones I was measuring.

Booting now.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> No image (no <SIGNAL>LCD_IG_PWR_EN</SIGNAL>) liquid damage, bongs, spins
